div.h5: Trending Questions

div.h1: Oracle Developer Virtual Webcasts and Workshops

div.p: Enhance your developer skills with our technical, educational and interactive virtual events.

section.div:
Upcoming
Register for an upcoming live webcasts or workshop.

div.class: cb137w2 col-framework col4 col-multi col-smallgutters col-justified

div.strong:
DEVELOPER LIVE: March 30, 2021
8:30 a.m. IST
Asia Pacific
div.h5: Oracle Developer Live - Java Innovations

div.strong:
DEVELOPER LIVE: March 30, 2021
8:30 a.m. IST
Asia Pacific

div.p:
Oracle Developer Live - Java Innovations
Learn how Java can help you create the next generation of rich, scalable, secure, and modern applications for a variety of targeted deployment environments. Gain insight into innovations within the Java 16 release that improve the performance, stability, and security of application development.

div.strong:
WEBCAST: March 30, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas
div.h5: Best practices in designing JSON document model in Autonomous JSON Database

div.strong:
WEBCAST: March 30, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas

div.p:
Best practices in designing JSON document model in Autonomous JSON Database
This session focuses on JSON design, modeling questions and best practices to support your application development. We will share our top 10 tips for processing JSON in a database and give a live demonstration of Autonomous JSON Database Cloud Service.

div.strong:
AUTONOMOUS DATABASE OFFICE HOURS: April 6, 2021
9:00 a.m. PT / 12:00 p.m. ET
Americas
div.h5: Auto-Scaling Configuration and Monitoring

div.strong:
AUTONOMOUS DATABASE OFFICE HOURS: April 6, 2021
9:00 a.m. PT / 12:00 p.m. ET
Americas

div.p:
Auto-Scaling Configuration and Monitoring
Learn how to establish your Auto-Scaling base line allocations, how to monitor its actions over time and correlate to billing reports, and when to consider augmenting with manual scaling activities.

div.strong:
CLOUD COACH OFFICE HOURS: April 12, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas
div.h5: Container Engine for Kubernetes

div.strong:
CLOUD COACH OFFICE HOURS: April 12, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas

div.p:
Container Engine for Kubernetes
Learn about Oracle Kubernetes Engine, how to spin up highly-available clusters in minutes and some use cases for simplifying your dev ops life cycle..

div.strong:
WEBCAST: April 15, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas
div.h5: Transform your WLS Java Apps to Microservices on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure with vFunction

div.strong:
WEBCAST: April 15, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas

div.p:
Transform your WLS Java Apps to Microservices on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure with vFunction
Learn how vFunction automates and accelerates the application modernization process on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.

div.strong:
VISUAL BUILDER OFFICE HOURS: April 19, 2021
12:00 p.m. PT / 3:00 p.m. ET
Americas
div.h5: Team Development and Lifecycle Management for Visual Apps

div.strong:
VISUAL BUILDER OFFICE HOURS: April 19, 2021
12:00 p.m. PT / 3:00 p.m. ET
Americas

div.p:
Team Development and Lifecycle Management for Visual Apps
Explore how development teams can improve their development process with Visual Builder Studio. Learn how to improve code version management, packaging, and deployment across environments.

div.strong:
WEBCAST: April 21, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas
div.h5: Migrate Your Oracle Forms Applications to Oracle APEX

div.strong:
WEBCAST: April 21, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas

div.p:
Migrate Your Oracle Forms Applications to Oracle APEX
Learn about the key reasons to modernize and when it's the right moment to start this type of project. We'll also show you how to convert a sample Oracle Forms application to Oracle APEX.

div.strong:
WEBCAST: April 27, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas
div.h5: Accelerate Application Development with Autonomous JSON Database

div.strong:
WEBCAST: April 27, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas

div.p:
Accelerate Application Development with Autonomous JSON Database
Learn about the JSON capabilities in Oracle Database and how it can help with application development. Software engineer Josh Spiegel will cover functionality, architecture, and best practices for accessing JSON from a Java program.

div.strong:
WORKSHOP: April 29, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas
div.h5: Choose your Own JSON Adventure: Relational or Document Store

div.strong:
WORKSHOP: April 29, 2021
10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET
Americas

div.p:
Choose your Own JSON Adventure: Relational or Document Store
Learn how the Oracle Database can not only store, index and have transactional consistency (ACID) with JSON documents, but how you can leverage all the power of the database for advanced security, application development and a whole suite of Simple Oracle Document Access (SODA) APIs.

section.div:
On Demand
Couldn’t attend a live event, no problem! Watch it on demand anytime.

div.class: cb137w2 col-framework col4 col-multi col-smallgutters col-justified

div.h5: Microservices Distributed Tracing: from traces to operational insights

div.p:
Microservices Distributed Tracing: from traces to operational insights
Learn how to implement Opentracing in your microservices deployment, how to extend the coverage to older legacy java components, and how to use the trace data for diagnostics, monitoring, planning and reporting.

div.h5: Build a Fully Functional APEX App from a Spreadsheet in 45 Minutes!

div.p:
Build a Fully Functional APEX App from a Spreadsheet in 45 Minutes!
Get hands on experience learning how the new APEX Service works to build a fully functional APEX app in less than an hour. In this lab, you'll learn how to create an APEX App from a Spreadsheet and navigate and make changes to the APEX Application

div.h5: Application Continuity for Developers

div.p:
Application Continuity for Developers
Application Continuity hides interruptions from applications and users. Learn how application developers and owners can easily take advantage of this functionality to add this resiliency transparently to the user experience without making changes to the application code.

div.h5: APEX + Server-side JavaScript = Awesome!

div.p:
APEX + Server-side JavaScript = Awesome!
Starting with Oracle Database 21c, developers can now execute JavaScript within the database. This functionality is enabled by the Multilingual Engine (MLE), powered by GraalVM. And APEX 20.2 is the first (and only) low code framework on the planet which natively supports server-side JavaScript, out of the box!

div.h5: Developing Serverless Applications on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

div.p:
Developing Serverless Applications on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
Learn how easy it is to build and deploy a serverless applications on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.

div.strong: ON DEMAND VISUAL BUILDER OFFICE HOURS
div.h5: Performance Optimization for Visual Builder Apps

div.strong: ON DEMAND VISUAL BUILDER OFFICE HOURS

div.p:
Performance Optimization for Visual Builder Apps
Learn how to optimize your Visual Builder apps to run faster with new tips, techniques, and architectural and development considerations.

div.h5: Message Driven Microservices & Monoliths with Micronaut

div.p:
Message Driven Microservices & Monoliths with Micronaut
Learn how to get started implementing messaging in your applications using open source tools such as Apache Kafka and RabbitMQ, as well as a managed Oracle Cloud-based option that can be plugged into your service with very little setup and configuration.

div.h5: Build Cloud Native Applications on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

div.p:
Build Cloud Native Applications on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
Learn how you can build and deploy a microservice-based application on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure using Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Container Engine for Kubernetes (OKE).

div.strong: ON DEMAND CLOUD COACHING OFFICE HOURS
div.h5: Autonomous Database vs. Classic

div.strong: ON DEMAND CLOUD COACHING OFFICE HOURS

div.p:
Autonomous Database vs. Classic
Learn about Oracle's Database Services as we compare use cases for Autonomous Database vs. Classic and demonstrate how to provision each.

div.h5: Auto-Indexing Deep Dive

div.p:
Auto-Indexing Deep Dive
Learn some Auto-Indexing best practices and how to monitor the dynamic changes made over time.

div.h5: Why developers choose NoSQL Database for application development?

div.p:
Why developers choose NoSQL Database for application development?
Learn the technical drivers and business rationale for choosing to use NoSQL technology, use cases and deployment patterns developers use when choosing NoSQL technology, and design tradeoffs commonly made by app developers in choosing between relational and non-relational data stores

div.strong: ON DEMAND VISUAL BUILDER OFFICE HOURS
div.h5: Visual Builder - New Features for February 2021

div.strong: ON DEMAND VISUAL BUILDER OFFICE HOURS

div.p:
Visual Builder - New Features for February 2021
The February version of Visual Builder will offer many new features. In this session, we'll review the key features in the areas of coding environment, services and backends, Git integration, and more.

div.h5: Real-world Low Code: Four partners show how they deliver solutions using Oracle APEX!

div.p:
Real-world Low Code: Four partners show how they deliver solutions using Oracle APEX!
In this special edition of APEX Office Hours, we will be joined by four different Oracle partners who will share real-world solutions they've developed using Oracle APEX, across numerous industries and use cases. It's a great opportunity to see what is possible with low code and APEX, and also understand why these professional developers choose APEX.

div.h5: Incorporating DevSecOps into Oracle Container Engine for Kubernetes with Check Point's CloudGuard

div.p:
Incorporating DevSecOps into Oracle Container Engine for Kubernetes with Check Point's CloudGuard
This webinar will present options using Terraform and Helm for integrating Check Point's CloudGuard Posture Management for Kubernetes in OKE and deployment of Check Point's CloudGuard AppSec protection for Kubernetes applications.

div.h5: Storage Services

div.p:
Storage Services
Learn how Oracle Cloud Storage delivers consistent high performance and scalability. We’ll introduce local, object, file, block and archive storage services and address key storage workload requirements and use cases.

div.h5: Creating an App based on Existing Tables for Oracle Autonomous Cloud Service

div.p:
Creating an App based on Existing Tables for Oracle Autonomous Cloud Service
This workshop walks you through creating an APEX application based on existing tables in your Oracle Database. You will build the first cut of an app based on existing table, reload an app and regenerate, add and link pages, manipulate regions and items, and define client-side interactivity declaratively.

div.h5: How Autonomous Database accelerates developer productivity

div.p:
How Autonomous Database accelerates developer productivity
A kick-off of a new monthly Autonomous Database deep dive developer series. The series will be dedicated to technical deep dive on how to use specific autonomous database capabilities, each month covering a different feature. This kick-off webcast will give an overview of the latest autonomous database capabilities with a snapshot of the features we will be covering in deep dive sessions in the coming months. We will cover the ways in which Autonomous Database automates developer activities, streamlines development of critical business applications, review autonomous features and review of the developer facing tools and 3rd party integrations with IDE's, SDKs, orchestration technology.

div.h5: Explore the converged functionality of Oracle Autonomous Database

div.p:
Explore the converged functionality of Oracle Autonomous Database
Explore Oracle's converged Autonomous Database, a multi-model, multitenant, multi-workload database. In this hands on workshop, you'll learn ways to consolidate and isolate a shared data model across multiple development teams and using all workload.

div.h5: Terraforming the Cloud with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Resource Manager

div.p:
Terraforming the Cloud with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Resource Manager
Learn how to script a web application with Terraform and use Resource Manager to deploy to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI). Join this webcast to discover practical, in-the-field techniques of infra as a code. We demonstrate how to use best practices methodologies of automation while introducing the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Resource Manager framework for using Terraform on OCI to codify infrastructure.

div.h5: Build a Fully Functional APEX App from a Spreadsheet in 45 minutes!

div.p:
Build a Fully Functional APEX App from a Spreadsheet in 45 minutes!
Get your feet wet learning how the new APEX Service works to build a fully functional APEX app in less than an hour. In this lab, you'll learn how to create an APEX App from a Spreadsheet and navigate and make changes to the APEX Application

div.h5: Faster and safer application deployments on Kubernetes with Shipa and Oracle Kubernetes Engine (OKE)

div.p:
Faster and safer application deployments on Kubernetes with Shipa and Oracle Kubernetes Engine (OKE)
In this webcast we will show you how Shipa and OKE provide developers an application-centric view they need so they never have to think about Kubernetes objects again, allow platform engineers to put up guardrails and centrally control deployments across multiple clusters, monitor application performance, and implement network policies and security configurations from a centralized dashboard and eliminate the need for custom Helm charts, Terraform scripts and YAML, reducing months of work that has to be done before pushing your first application into production.

div.h5: Cloud Coaching Office Hours: Computing Fundamentals

div.p:
Cloud Coaching Office Hours: Computing Fundamentals
In this session, learn how to set up Bare Metal, Virtual Machine, and Dedicated Hosts instances and hear about the advanced features and performance OCI compute provides, with a variety of image and shape options.

div.h5: Visual Builder - What’s New

div.p:
Visual Builder - What’s New
Learn about the new features added to Oracle Visual Builder in the latest release and how they benefit you. We’ll demonstrate Redwood UI and Oracle JET 9 updates, Improved development experience, and Visual Builder Studio integration for team development and CI/CD. We’ll also discuss what you need to know about upgrades, and the latest learning resources published for developers.

div.h5: Flows for APEX - Model & run process flows within APEX!

div.p:
Flows for APEX - Model & run process flows within APEX!
Flows for APEX is an open source solution enabling you to design and run process flows within your APEX application. This was developed by expert members of the Oracle APEX community, and it has quickly evolved into a functionally rich process modeling solution. In this special edition of Oracle APEX Office Hours, we will be joined by the creators of Flows for APEX, where they will present and demonstrate the latest version 5 of Flows for APEX.

div.h5: Oracle Cloud Coaching: Networking and Connectivity

div.p:
Oracle Cloud Coaching: Networking and Connectivity
Learn how to set up a virtual cloud network with firewall rules and communication gateways that you can choose. Highly skilled solution engineers will show you how to define public or private subnets within your VCN, add virtual routers to control traffic flow to outside destinations and secure your cloud network and compute instances.

div.h5: Accelerate development of data driven applications with Oracle’s Database Tools

div.p:
Accelerate development of data driven applications with Oracle’s Database Tools
Learn how you can load different types of data from multiple sources in a few simple steps using Oracle's free database tools.

div.h5: What's New in Oracle APEX 20.2 with Printing!

div.p:
What's New in Oracle APEX 20.2 with Printing!
Join APEX development team as they explorer the new printing capabilities in APEX 20.2

div.h5: Cloud Coaching Office Hours: Identity and Access Management

div.p:
Cloud Coaching Office Hours: Identity and Access Management
Learn how to set up consistent identity enforcement and manage employee, partner, and consumer access to cloud resources with Oracle Identity and Access Management.

div.h5: Accelerate & Simplify Blockchain Application Development

div.p:
Accelerate & Simplify Blockchain Application Development
Learn about Oracle’s new developer enhancements designed to reduce the time spent developing and coding blockchain apps.

div.h5: Spend Less Time Debugging Code with ML-based Log Analytics

div.p:
Spend Less Time Debugging Code with ML-based Log Analytics
Let’s face it. You love to code but debugging pesky problems is always in the way. Join us in this session to learn how to identify business flows that are behaving abnormally and use machine learning techniques, including pattern recognition, trend analysis, cluster compare and links, among others, to quickly troubleshoot code defects and application performance issues.

div.h5: What's new in APEX 20.2

div.p:
What's new in APEX 20.2
There are many new features coming in APEX 20.2. In this session, we will present and demonstrate the marquee features of this latest release.

div.h5: Developer Focus on Converged Database

div.p:
Developer Focus on Converged Database2
Oracle’s Converged Database offers a robust set of application development tools that empower developers to create fully integrated business applications. This webcast will discuss the different ways developers can leverage the wide variety of tools, workloads, data types, analytics and data management functionality supported by Oracle’s Converged Database platform.

div.h5: Getting Started with JSON Document Collections in the Autonomous JSON Database

div.p:
Getting Started with JSON Document Collections in the Autonomous JSON Database
Todd Sharp introduces you to the Autonomous JSON Database (AJD). AJD is exciting because it represents the very first time Oracle is offering a dedicated solution for JSON document collection persistence in the Oracle Cloud. It represents Oracle's commitment to offering developers tools and solutions that help them solve the problems they face when developing microservices and applications instead of trying to convince them to use a tool that might not be the best fit for them.

div.h5: Ingest, Analyze, and Manage Your Logs with OCI Logging

div.p:
Ingest, Analyze, and Manage Your Logs with OCI Logging
Learn how to use the powerful analytics engine to search and analyze logs, and use the intuitive rules engine to act in near real-time on any log event.

div.h5: Moving Logs with Oracle Service Connector Hub

div.p:
Moving Logs with Oracle Service Connector Hub
Learn how to move logs from the Logging Service to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure services such as Object Storage, Streaming, Monitoring, Functions and Notifications.

div.h5: RackWare Enables Container Migration to Oracle Cloud Container Engine for Kubernetes

div.p:
RackWare Enables Container Migration to Oracle Cloud Container Engine for Kubernetes
Learn how RackWare Enables Container Migration to the Oracle Kubernetes Engine

div.h5: Advanced Chatbot Development - the Art of What's Possible

div.p:
Advanced Chatbot Development - the Art of What's Possible
Learn how Oracle Digital Assistant is pushing beyond the wall of what’s possible in enterprise chatbot development.

div.h5: Location matters! Map Visualization for APEX Developers

div.p:
Location matters! Map Visualization for APEX Developers
Learn everything about the Oracle Maps technology and how to use it in APEX applications.

Carsten Czarski, Consulting Member of Technical Staff
Honglei.x.Zhu, Principal Member of Technical Staff

div.h5: Getting Started with Serverless Apps on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure

p.strong: Getting Started with Serverless Apps on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
p.br: Serverless Computing is now available in the Oracle Cloud. Join us for an overview of Oracle Cloud's Functions-as-a-Service and learn how you can use Oracle Cloud’s serverless building blocks - Functions, Events, and API Gateway - to build modern, event-driven microservices.

div.p:
Greg Verstraeten, Senior Principal Product Manager
Sachin Pikle, Product Strategy Director

div.h5: The Top 12 New Features in APEX 20.1 that Everyone Should Know!

p.strong: The Top 12 New Features in APEX 20.1 that Everyone Should Know!
p.br: Learn what the top 10 features of 20.1 are and how you can enhance your APEX applications.

div.p: Joel Kallman, Senior Director, Software Development

div.h5: Hidden Gems in the Cloud

p.br: Learn where to find and how to use these lesser-known features. You’ll be sure to learn a few tips for saving money on your cloud bill, ensuring compliance, manage your database instances, monitor performance and even some tips for writing more efficient code in your applications.

div.p: Todd Sharp, Oracle Developer Advocate

div.h5: Headless CMS: Creating Modern Digital Experience

p.strong: Headless CMS: Creating Modern Digital Experience
p.br: Learn how to utilize Oracle Content and Experience as an enterprise-grade CMS and intelligent content platform suited to serve a variety of content and architecture needs.

div.p:
Preston So, Senior Director, Product Strategy
Lee Ribeiro, Product Marketing Manager

div.h5: Managing Kubernetes Applications on Oracle Cloud with Nirmata

p.strong: Managing Kubernetes Applications on Oracle Cloud with Nirmata
p.br: Learn how Nirmata can be used to provision and manage OKE clusters. We will explore how Nirmata addresses Day 2 operations challenges for OKE clusters and discuss how Nirmata simplifies application deployment and management of cloud-native applications.

div.p:
Ritesh Patel, VP, Product, Nirmata
Gilson Melo, Director of Product Management, Oracle

div.h5: Optimizing grocery delivery routes using Oracle APEX, Oracle Autonomous Database and Google Maps APIs

p.strong: Optimizing grocery delivery routes using Oracle APEX, Oracle Autonomous Database and Google Maps APIs
p.br: Learn how Santhosh Jose, a Principal Applications Engineer in the Oracle HCM product development organization discovered Oracle APEX to solve a specific problem during the Pandemic. He built a RouteBuilder app that optimizes grocery delivery routes.

div.p:
Santhosh Jose, Principal Applications Engineer
Joel Kallman, Senior Director, Software Development

div.h5: Beginner's Guide to Oracle APEX

p.br: You've heard about Oracle APEX, you're keen to learn more and see what it can do.

div.p: Anthony Rayner, Principal Member of Technical Staff - APEX Team

div.h5: Introduction to JavaScript for APEX Developers

p.strong: Introduction to JavaScript for APEX Developers
p.br: Learn how to write essential JavaScript code, add it to APEX apps, and work with jQuery and the DOM.

div.p: Dan McGhan, Developer Advocate

section.div:
Self-Guided Labs
Get hands on experience performing a self guided lab at your own pace.

div.h5: Get Hands on Experience Developing in the Oracle Cloud

div.p: Get Hands on Experience Developing in the Oracle Cloud at your own pace. See a list of the hands on workshops using Oracle Cloud services.

div.h5: Get Hands on Experience Developing with Oracle Database in the Oracle Cloud

div.p: Get Hands on Experience Developing with Oracle Database in the Oracle Cloud at your own pace.

div.h5: Get Hands on Experience Developing Java Applications in the Oracle Cloud

div.p: Get Hands on Experience Developing Java Applications in the Oracle Cloud at your own pace.

div.h5: Get Hands on Experience Developing Apps with MySQL Database Service

div.p: Get Hands on Experience Developing Apps with MySQL Database Service at your own pace.
